body:
You cannot use this form to complain about:

* the result of a case
* a judge, magistrate, coroner or member of a tribunal

This online form is also available in [Welsh (Cymraeg)](https://complain-about-a-court-or-tribunal.form.service.justice.gov.uk/cy).
body:cy:
Ni ellir defnyddio'r ffurflen hon i gwyno am:

* ganlyniad achos 
* barnwr, ynad, crwner neu aelod o dribiwnlys
heading: Complain about a court or tribunal
heading:cy: Gwneud cwyn am lys neu dribiwnlys
lede: Your complaint will not affect your case.
lede:cy: Ni fydd eich cwyn yn effeithio ar eich achos.
